changelog: 2.1 - includes a large amount of new content. Check the Mission Creator thread on Hitmanforum for more info!
beta_changelog: Added the ability to customise more display elements, as well as fixing some bugs. Difficulties are now selectable in-game for QE-created missions.

message.text: You aren't meant to be seeing this - tell Atampy26 on Hitmanforum so he can fix it.
